acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

getDeposit(address).details: Returns the amount of JOE tokens staked by an account.

returns._0: The amount of JOE tokens staked by the account.

getPendingReward(address).details: Returns the pending reward of an account.

returns.rewardAmount: The pending reward of the account.

getRewarder().details: Returns the JOE Staking Rewarder contract.

getTotalDeposit().details: Returns the total amount of JOE tokens staked.

returns._0: The total amount of JOE tokens staked.

params.initialOwner: The initial owner of the contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

setRewarder(address).details: Sets the JOE Staking Rewarder contract. Only the owner can call this function.

params.amount: The amount of JOE tokens to stake.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

params.amount: The amount of JOE tokens to unstake.

documentation.text:
@title Joe Staking Contract
 @dev The Joe Staking Contract allows users to stake JOE tokens to receive JOE tokens or other rewards.
